overview: Francesca Levi transposed Parajanov’s classic The Colour of Pomegranates to the no less exotic seaside resort of Blackpool in the UK. Her sister, film composer Mica Levi (Jackie, Under the Skin) delivered the musical equivalent for this kaleidoscopic video. Originally conceived as a part of the series ‘The Unfilmables’.
title: The Colour of Chips
